Class SimulatorController

java.lang.Object
fr.tp.inf112.projects.robotsim.controller.SimulatorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CanvasViewerController, Observable
public class SimulatorController extends Object implements CanvasViewerController
Controller for the simulator, managing the interaction between the factory model and the canvas viewer.

Implements the CanvasViewerController interface to provide functionality for managing the canvas, starting/stopping animations, and handling observers.

This controller delegates simulation logic to the Factory model.
